document_data.name: Temple District of Bral
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple District''' was one of the thirteen districts of [[Bral]], the sole city on the surface of the [[Rock of Bral]]. It was the main religious district of Bral, housing many of the city's temples.

Notable Locations.Temples:
* [[House of the Path and the Way]]
* [[Pantheistic College of Celestian]]
* [[Pantheist Temple of Tyr]]
* [[Planar Church of Olympus (Bral)|Planar Church of Olympus]]
* [[Planar Church of the Seven Heavens (Bral)|Planar Church of the Seven Heavens]]
* Shrines dedicated to [[polygot]] faiths.<ref>
* [[Temple of Ptah]]
